issues.title: Insurance Coverage Discrepancy
issues.message: Despite an approved pre-authorization for ₹500,000, the insurance has covered ₹0.00 of the ₹400,000 hospital bill. This leaves a patient balance of ₹350,000, which also shows a ₹50,000 discrepancy from the total bill minus insurance coverage (₹400,000 - ₹0.00 = ₹400,000, not ₹350,000). This indicates a significant issue preventing insurance payout and requires immediate investigation.
issues.suggested_action: Investigate the discrepancy between the approved pre-authorization and the actual insurance payout. Verify if all billed procedures align with the pre-authorization, check for any unstated deductibles, co-pays, or non-covered services, and clarify the calculation of the patient's final balance.
evidence: Pre-authorization status: approved, Approved amount: ₹500,000.0. Financial Details: Amount Covered by Insurance: ₹0.00, Patient's Balance: ₹350,000.00, Total Hospital Bill: ₹400,000.00.

issues.title: Medication Order Pending Dispense
issues.message: The pharmacy order for 'Jondise' is currently pending and has not been dispensed.
issues.suggested_action: Follow up with pharmacy to expedite dispensing of Jondise.

issues.title: Discharge Medication Not Found in Pharmacy Orders
issues.message: The discharge medication 'Insulin Glargine' is prescribed but is not listed in the provided pharmacy order status. It may not have been ordered or tracked.
issues.suggested_action: Verify Insulin Glargine prescription has been sent to pharmacy and track its order status immediately.

issues.title: Potential Medication-Allergy Conflict
issues.message: The patient has a 'Liver complaint' allergy. 'Dolo-Crosine' (generic: Acetaminophen Extended) is hepatotoxic and should be used with caution or an alternative considered in patients with liver issues.
issues.suggested_action: Review Dolo-Crosine prescription with prescribing physician considering the 'Liver complaint' allergy. Consider alternative analgesics or dose adjustment with liver function monitoring.

issues.title: Discharge Medication Payment Pending
issues.message: Payment status for all discharge medications (Dolo-Crosine, Jondise, Insulin Glargine) is pending.
issues.suggested_action: Ensure patient or financial department clears payment for all discharge medications before release.

issues.title: Ambulance transport required
issues.message: Patient has Liver Cancer and Excess Panting, requiring medical supervision during transport. An ALS ambulance is recommended for serious conditions and monitoring.
issues.suggested_action: Proceed with booking an ALS ambulance.

issues.title: Final Invoice Not Generated
issues.message: The final invoice for patient P00231 (ACC-00231-2024) has not been generated. Discharge cannot proceed without a finalized invoice.
issues.suggested_action: Generate the final invoice and ensure all charges are accurately reflected.

issues.title: Pending Billing Adjustments
issues.message: There are pending adjustments that need to be resolved before the final invoice can be accurately generated. This includes an insurance pre-authorization and a dialysis procedure billing.
issues.suggested_action: Expedite the resolution of all pending adjustments, especially the insurance pre-authorization and the dialysis procedure billing, to finalize the patient's account.

issues.title: Required test pending
issues.message: The 'Chest X-Ray' test is required for discharge but its status is 'pending'.
issues.suggested_action: Ensure the Chest X-Ray is completed and reviewed before discharge.

issues.title: Critical lab value detected
issues.message: Complete Blood Count (CBC) shows a critical RBC value of 2.8 10^6/uL. Reference range: 4.5-5.9 10^6/uL. Critical threshold: 3.0 10^6/uL.
issues.suggested_action: Review the critical RBC value with the medical team and determine appropriate intervention or further investigation.

issues.title: Critical lab value detected
issues.message: Complete Blood Count (CBC) shows a critical Platelets value of 960 10^3/uL. Reference range: 150-400 10^3/uL. Critical threshold: 450 10^3/uL.
issues.suggested_action: Review the critical Platelets value with the medical team and determine appropriate intervention or further investigation.

issues.title: Critical lab value detected
issues.message: Complete Blood Count (CBC) shows a critical Hemoglobin value of 8.2 g/dL. Reference range: 13.5-17.5 g/dL. Critical threshold: 10.0 g/dL.
issues.suggested_action: Review the critical Hemoglobin value with the medical team and determine appropriate intervention or further investigation.
